channel.title: How to make food heal 1-3 randomly

item.title: How to make food heal 1-3 randomly
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“mahfuz, post:11, topic:267300”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=352899.msg2706152#msg2706152 date=1236997516]

Oooh, Not likely to be cussed out by Chassy. Gf.

Really the LAST thing on my mind is shortening code. I don’t want crap from anybody. I barely ever cuss on a forum, and I am sorry.
[/quote]
You said it was the sloppy way because that was the only way you knew how to do it.[/quote]

Rofl, okay? I am not going to fight with you, I have enough problems of my own. You used a misc.random the short way, congratulations. I lost a family member today, I don’t need your feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make food heal 1-3 randomly
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“mahfuz, post:6, topic:267300”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=352899.msg2705905#msg2705905 date=1236984855]

[code]case ###:
setAnimation(0x33D);
animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
if(misc.random(3) == 1) {
currentHealth += 3;
} else

			if(misc.random(3) == 2) {
			currentHealth += 2;
			} else

			if(misc.random(3) == 3) {
			currentHealth += 1;
			}

			if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
				currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
			sendMessage("You eat the shrimp.");
		break;[/code]

That’s the sloppy way to do it.
[/quote]
How do you have moparscape vet?

case ###: setAnimation(0x33D); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; currentHealth += 1 + misc.random(2); //i want to make it heal 1, 2, or 3 if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendMessage("You eat the shrimp."); break;[/quote]

I said it was the sloppy way, shut the hell up.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make food heal 1-3 randomly
